cards.name: Jack-o'-Lantern
cards.text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jack-o'-Lantern: Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
{1}, Exile Jack-o'-Lantern from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.
cards.flavor: By the end of the festival, it was the only thing still grinning.

foreignNames.name: Kürbislaterne
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, opfere die Kürbislaterne: Schicke bis zu eine Karte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof ins Exil. Ziehe eine Karte.
{1}, schicke die Kürbislaterne aus deinem Friedhof ins Exil: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
foreignNames.flavor: Am Ende des Festivals war sie das Einzige, was noch grinste.

foreignNames.name: Calabaza tallada
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, sacrificar la Calabaza tallada: Exilia hasta una carta objetivo de un cementerio. Roba una carta.
{1}, exiliar la Calabaza tallada de tu cementerio: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
foreignNames.flavor: Cuando acabó el festival, era lo único que sonreía.

foreignNames.name: Citrouille
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, sacrifiez la Citrouille : Exilez jusqu'à une carte ciblée depuis un cimetière. Piochez une carte.
{1}, exilez la Citrouille depuis votre cimetière : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
foreignNames.flavor: À la fin du Festival, c'était la seule chose à encore sourire.

foreignNames.name: Testa di Zucca
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifica la Testa di Zucca: Esilia fino a una carta bersaglio da un cimitero. Pesca una carta.
{1}, Esilia la Testa di Zucca dal tuo cimitero: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
foreignNames.flavor: Alla fine del festival, era l'unica che ancora sorrideva.

foreignNames.name: ジャック・オー・ランタン
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, ジャック・オー・ランタンを生け贄に捧げる：墓地にあるカード最大１枚を対象とする。それを追放する。カード１枚を引く。
{1}, あなたの墓地にあるジャック・オー・ランタンを追放する：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 収穫祭が終わりを迎える頃、笑い続けていたのはこれだけだった。

foreignNames.name: 잭오랜턴
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, 잭오랜턴을 희생한다: 무덤에 있는 카드를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 추방한다. 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
{1}, 당신의 무덤에서 잭오랜턴을 추방한다: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 축제가 끝나갈 때쯤이 되자, 여전히 웃고 있는 것은 그것뿐이었다.

foreignNames.name: Jack da Lanterna
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, sacrifique Jack da Lanterna: Exile até um card alvo de um cemitério. Compre um card.
{1}, exile Jack da Lanterna de seu cemitério: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.
foreignNames.flavor: Ao fim do festival, ele era o único que ainda sorria.

foreignNames.name: Тыквенный Фонарь
foreignNames.text:
{1}, {T}, пожертвуйте Тыквенный Фонарь: изгоните не более одной целевой карты из кладбища. Возьмите карту.
{1}, изгоните Тыквенный Фонарь из вашего кладбища: добавьте одну ману любого цвета.
foreignNames.flavor: К концу фестиваля только на его лице осталась улыбка.

foreignNames.name: 南瓜灯
foreignNames.text:
{1}，{T}，牺牲南瓜灯：将至多一张目标牌从坟墓场放逐。抓一张牌。
{1}，从你的坟墓场放逐南瓜灯：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
foreignNames.flavor: 收成节落幕时，只有它上面还挂着笑脸。

foreignNames.name: 南瓜燈
foreignNames.text:
{1}，{T}，犧牲南瓜燈：將至多一張目標牌從墳墓場放逐。抽一張牌。
{1}，從的墳墓場放逐南瓜燈：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。
foreignNames.flavor: 收成節落幕時，只有它上面還掛著笑臉。

cards.originalText:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Jack-o'-Lantern: Exile up to one target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.
{1}, Exile Jack-o'-Lantern from your graveyard: Add one mana of any color.

cards.name: Moonsilver Key
cards.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Moonsilver Key: Search your library for an artifact card with a mana ability or a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.flavor: To restore the day-night balance, the Celestus mechanism's Sungold Lock must be reunited with its long-lost key.

foreignNames.name: Schlüssel aus Mondsilber
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, opfere den Schlüssel aus Mondsilber: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Artefaktkarte mit einer Manafähigkeit oder einer Standardland-Karte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische danach.
foreignNames.flavor: Um das Gleichgewicht von Tag und Nacht wiederherzustellen, muss das Sonnengold-Schloss des Celestus-Mechanismus wieder mit seinem lange verlorenen Schlüssel vereint werden.

foreignNames.name: Llave de platalunar
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrificar la Llave de platalunar: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de artefacto con una habilidad de maná o una carta de tierra básica, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja.
foreignNames.flavor: La cerradura de orosolar del mecanismo Celestus debe reunirse con su llave perdida para restaurar el equilibrio entre el día y la noche.

foreignNames.name: Clé d'argent de lune
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrifiez la Clé d'argent de lune : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte d'artefact avec une capacité de mana ou une carte de terrain de base, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main, puis mélangez.
foreignNames.flavor: Pour restaurer l'équilibre entre le jour et la nuit, la Serrure d'or solaire du Celestus devait être réunie avec sa clé disparue.

foreignNames.name: Chiave di Selenargento
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifica la Chiave di Selenargento: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta artefatto con un'abilità di mana o una carta terra base, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola.
foreignNames.flavor: Per ripristinare l'equilibrio del giorno e della notte, la Serratura di Eliodoro del meccanismo del Celestus deve essere ricongiunta alla sua perduta chiave.

foreignNames.name: 月銀の鍵
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, 月銀の鍵を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーからマナ能力を持つアーティファクト・カードや基本土地・カードのうち１枚を探し、公開し、あなたの手札に加える。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor: 昼と夜の均衡を取り戻すためには、セレスタスの装置の日金の錠に長きに渡り失われた鍵が挿さらなければならない。

foreignNames.name: 은달빛 열쇠
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, 은달빛 열쇠를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 마나 능력을 가진 마법물체 카드 또는 기본 대지 카드를 찾아, 그 카드를 공개하고, 당신의 손에 넣은 후, 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 낮과 밤의 균형을 회복하려면, 셀레스투스 기관에 있는 태양황금 자물쇠가 행방을 알 수 없게 된 지 오래인 열쇠와 다시 결합되어야만 한다.

foreignNames.name: Chave de Prata Lunar
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, sacrifique Chave de Prata Lunar: Procure em seu grimório um card de artefato com uma habilidade de mana ou um card de terreno básico, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe.
foreignNames.flavor: Para restaurar o equilíbrio entre a noite e o dia, a Fechadura de Ouro Solar do Celestus precisa ser reunida com sua chave há muito perdida.

foreignNames.name: Ключ Лунного Серебра
foreignNames.text: {1}, {T}, пожертвуйте Ключ Лунного Серебра: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту артефакта с мана-способностью или карту базовой земли, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Чтобы восстановился баланс дня и ночи, Замок солнечного золота в механизме Целестуса должен воссоединиться с давно потерянным ключом.

foreignNames.name: 月银钥
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}，牺牲月银钥：从你牌库中搜寻一张具法术力异能的神器牌或一张基本地牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 要恢复日夜平衡，就必须用遗失已久的钥匙去打开穹天仪的核心机关～旭金锁。

foreignNames.name: 月銀鑰
foreignNames.text: {1}，{T}，犧牲月銀鑰：從你牌庫中搜尋一張具魔法力異能的神器牌或一張基本地牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 要恢復日夜平衡，就必須用遺失已久的鑰匙去打開穹天儀的核心機關～旭金鎖。

cards.originalText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Moonsilver Key: Search your library for an artifact card with a mana ability or a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

cards.name: Mystic Skull // Mystic Monstrosity
cards.text:
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}: Transform Mystic Skull.
cards.flavor: It waited on the barn wall for decades, forgotten, looking for the perfect opportunity.
cards.originalText:
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{5}, {T}: Transform Mystic Skull.

cards.name: Mystic Skull // Mystic Monstrosity
cards.text: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
cards.flavor: Under the light of an unnatural moon, it walked out on legs of straw with joints of hinges ripped from the barn doors.
cards.originalText: Lands you control have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

cards.name: Pithing Needle
cards.text:
As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
cards.flavor: Occasionally a skaab remembers too much of its former life. Luckily, there's an easy cure.

rulings.text: Pithing Needle affects cards regardless of what zone they’re in. This includes cards in hand, cards in the graveyard, and exiled cards. For example, a player can’t cycle Eternal Dragon or return an Eternal Dragon from their graveyard to hand if Pithing Needle naming Eternal Dragon is on the battlefield.
You can name any card, even if that card doesn’t normally have an activated ability. You can’t name a token unless that token has the same name as a card.
If you name a card that has both a mana ability and another activated ability, the mana ability can be activated but the other ability can’t be activated.
Once Pithing Needle has left the battlefield, activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can be activated again.
Activated abilities include a colon and are written in the form “[cost]: [effect].” Triggered abilities and static abilities of the named card work normally.

foreignNames.name: Lähmungsnadel
foreignNames.text:
Sowie die Lähmungsnadel ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Kartennamen.
Aktivierte Fähigkeiten von Quellen mit dem bestimmten Namen können nicht aktiviert werden, es sei denn, es sind Manafähigkeiten.
foreignNames.flavor: Gelegentlich erinnert sich ein Skaab an zu viel aus einem früheren Leben. Glücklicherweise gibt es dagegen ein einfaches Mittel.

foreignNames.name: Aguja medular
foreignNames.text:
En cuanto la Aguja medular entre al campo de batalla, elige un nombre de carta.
Las habilidades activadas de las fuentes con el nombre elegido no pueden activarse a menos que sean habilidades de maná.
foreignNames.flavor: De vez en cuando, un skaab recuerda demasiado de su vida pasada. Menos mal que hay un remedio sencillo.

foreignNames.name: Aiguille à sectionner
foreignNames.text:
Au moment où l'Aiguille à sectionner arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un nom de carte.
Les capacités activées des sources du nom choisi ne peuvent pas être activées à moins qu'elles ne soient des capacités de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Parfois, un skaab se souvient un peu trop de son ancienne vie. Heureusement, il existe un remède simple.

foreignNames.name: Ago Spinale
foreignNames.text:
Mentre l'Ago Spinale entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli il nome di una carta.
Le abilità attivate delle fonti col nome scelto non possono essere attivate a meno che non siano abilità di mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Occasionalmente, uno skaab ricorda troppo della sua vita precedente. Fortunatamente, la cura è semplice.

foreignNames.name: 真髄の針
foreignNames.text:
真髄の針が戦場に出るに際し、カードの名前１つを選ぶ。
その選ばれた名前を持つ発生源の起動型能力は、それがマナ能力でないかぎり起動できない。
foreignNames.flavor: 時折、スカーブの生前の記憶が蘇り過ぎてしまうことがある。幸いにも、それには単純な治療法がある。

foreignNames.name: 연수에 꽂는 바늘
foreignNames.text:
연수에 꽂는 바늘이 전장에 들어오면서, 카드 이름 하나를 선택한다.
선택한 이름을 가진 원천의 활성화능력은 마나 능력이 아닌 한 활성화될 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: 때때로 스캅은 생전의 기억을 너무 많이 기억해내기도 한다. 다행히, 손쉬운 치료법이 있다.

foreignNames.name: Agulha Medular
foreignNames.text:
Conforme Agulha Medular entrar no campo de batalha, escolha um nome de card.
As habilidades ativadas de fontes com o nome escolhido não podem ser ativadas, a menos que sejam habilidades de mana.
foreignNames.flavor: Ocasionalmente, um skaab se lembra demais de sua vida anterior. Por sorte, há uma cura fácil.

foreignNames.name: Смертельная Игла
foreignNames.text:
При выходе Смертельной Иглы на поле битвы выберите имя карты.
Активируемые способности источников с выбранным именем не могут быть активированы, если только они не являются мана-способностями.
foreignNames.flavor: Иногда скааб слишком много вспоминает о своей прежней жизни. К счастью, для этого есть простое средство.

foreignNames.name: 穿髓金针
foreignNames.text:
于穿髓金针进战场时，选择一个牌名。
除了法术力异能之外，具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。
foreignNames.flavor: 有的时候尸嵌会记得前生太多往事。幸运的是，有种办法可以简单解决。

foreignNames.name: 穿髓金針
foreignNames.text:
於穿髓金針進戰場時，選擇一個牌名。
除了魔法力異能之外，具有該名稱之來源的起動式異能都不能起動。
foreignNames.flavor: 有的時候屍嵌會記得前生太多往事。幸運的是，有種辦法可以簡單解決。

cards.originalText:
As Pithing Needle enters the battlefield, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.

cards.name: Silver Bolt
cards.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Silver Bolt: It deals 3 damage to target creature. If a Werewolf is dealt damage this way, destroy it.
cards.flavor:
"When a werewolf charges, you'll only have time for one shot. Best make it count."
—Captain Eberheart

foreignNames.name: Silberbolzen
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, opfere den Silberbolzen: Er fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls einem Werwolf auf diese Weise Schaden zugefügt wird, zerstöre ihn.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Wenn ein Werwolf angreift, habt ihr nur Zeit für einen Schuss. Nutzt ihn gut."
—Kapitän Eberherz

foreignNames.name: Virote de plata
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, sacrificar el Virote de plata: Hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. Si un Licántropo recibe daño de esta manera, destrúyelo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Cuando ataca un licántropo, solo tienes tiempo para un disparo. Haz que valga la pena".
—Capitán Eberhart

foreignNames.name: Carreau d'argent
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, sacrifiez le Carreau d'argent : Il inflige 3 blessures à une créature ciblée. Si un loup-garou subit des blessures de cette manière, détruisez-le.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Quand un loup-garou charge, vous n'avez le temps de tirer qu'une seule fois. Mieux vaut ne pas le rater. »
—Capitaine Eberhart

foreignNames.name: Dardo d'Argento
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, Sacrifica il Dardo d'Argento: Infligge 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio. Se è stato inflitto danno a un Mannaro in questo modo, distruggilo.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando un mannaro carica verso di te, hai tempo per un solo colpo. Ti conviene fare centro."
—Capitano Eberheart

foreignNames.name: 銀弾
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, 銀弾を生け贄に捧げる：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。これはそれに３点のダメージを与える。これにより狼男がダメージを受けたなら、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor:
「人狼が突撃して来たら、一発にすべてを賭けることになる。しっかり狙えよ。」
――エバハート船長

foreignNames.name: 은화살
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, 은화살을 희생한다: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 은화살은 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다. 이런 식으로 늑대인간이 피해를 입었다면, 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"늑대인간이 달려들면, 단 한 발을 쏠 수 있는 시간밖에 없어. 맞히는 게 최선이지."
—에버하트 대장

foreignNames.name: Virote de Prata
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, sacrifique Virote de Prata: Ele causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo. Se um Lobisomem sofrer dano dessa forma, destrua-o.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Quando um lobisomem avança, você só tem tempo para um tiro. É bom que seja na mosca."
— Capitão Eberheart

foreignNames.name: Серебряный Болт
foreignNames.text: {3}, {T}, пожертвуйте Серебряный Болт: он наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу. Если таким образом наносятся повреждения Вервольфу, уничтожьте его.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Когда вервольф бросается в атаку, у тебя будет время только на один выстрел. Не промахнись».
— капитан Эберхарт

foreignNames.name: 银弩矢
foreignNames.text: {3}，{T}，牺牲银弩矢：它对目标生物造成3点伤害。如果某狼人以此法受到伤害，则消灭该狼人。
foreignNames.flavor:
「狼人冲锋后，你只有射一箭的机会。不要浪费。」
～船长艾博汉

foreignNames.name: 銀弩矢
foreignNames.text: {3}，{T}，犧牲銀弩矢：它對目標生物造成3點傷害。如果某狼人以此法受到傷害，則消滅該狼人。
foreignNames.flavor:
「狼人衝鋒後，你只有射一箭的機會。不要浪費。」
～船長艾博漢

cards.originalText: {3}, {T}, Sacrifice Silver Bolt: It deals 3 damage to target creature. If a Werewolf is dealt damage this way, destroy it.

cards.name: Stuffed Bear
cards.text: {2}: Stuffed Bear becomes a 4/4 green Bear artifact creature until end of turn.
cards.flavor: It takes a taxidermist of unusual skill to cleanly stuff and mount a beast without severing its primal, predatory drive.

foreignNames.name: Ausgestopfter Bär
foreignNames.text: {2}: Der Ausgestopfte Bär wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 4/4 grünen Bär-Artefaktkreatur.
foreignNames.flavor: Nur ein außergewöhnlich geschickter Präparator kann eine Bestie sauber ausstopfen und aufstellen, ohne ihren urtümlichen Jagdinstinkt zu zerstören.

foreignNames.name: Oso disecado
foreignNames.text: {2}: El Oso disecado se convierte en una criatura artefacto Oso verde 4/4 hasta el final del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Solo un taxidermista muy versado puede rellenar y preparar una bestia sin despojarla de su ímpetu de depredación primordial.

foreignNames.name: Ours empaillé
foreignNames.text: {2} : L'Ours empaillé devient une créature-artefact 4/4 verte Ours jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreignNames.flavor: Seul un taxidermiste hors-pair sait empailler et exposer une bête sans la priver de son instinct primaire de prédateur.

foreignNames.name: Orso Imbalsamato
foreignNames.text: {2}: L'Orso Imbalsamato diventa una creatura artefatto Orso 4/4 verde fino alla fine del turno.
foreignNames.flavor: Solo un tassidermista di straordinaria abilità può imbalsamare e montare una bestia senza rimuovere il suo istinto predatorio.

foreignNames.name: 熊の剥製
foreignNames.text: {2}：ターン終了時まで、熊の剥製は緑の４/４の熊・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。
foreignNames.flavor: 剥製師が、獣の原始的な捕食者的本能を損なわずに丁寧に詰めて飾るには、特別な技術が必要になる。

foreignNames.name: 배를 채운 곰
foreignNames.text: {2}: 배를 채운 곰은 턴종료까지 4/4 녹색 곰 마법물체 생물이 된다.
foreignNames.flavor: 특출난 솜씨를 가진 박제사만이 짐승의 원시적이고 흉포한 본성이 그대로 드러나게 유지하면서 깨끗하게 속을 채워넣어 세울 수 있다.

foreignNames.name: Urso Empalhado
foreignNames.text: {2}: Urso Empalhado torna-se uma criatura artefato Urso verde 4/4 até o final do turno.
foreignNames.flavor: É preciso um taxidermista de habilidade excepcional para empalhar uma fera sem danificar o instinto predatório primário.

foreignNames.name: Чучело Медведя
foreignNames.text: {2}: Чучело Медведя становится артефактом существом 4/4 зеленый Медведь до конца хода.
foreignNames.flavor: Чтобы набить и поставить такого зверя, не потеряв его природный хищный облик, нужен чучельник выдающегося мастерства.

foreignNames.name: 填充熊
foreignNames.text: {2}：填充熊成为4/4绿色的熊神器生物直到回合结束。
foreignNames.flavor: 仔细填充野兽尸身令其站立，同时又不失却其原初猎捕本能，这需要超凡技艺的标本师才能做到。

foreignNames.name: 填充熊
foreignNames.text: {2}：填充熊成為4/4綠色的熊神器生物直到回合結束。
foreignNames.flavor: 仔細填充野獸屍身令其站立，同時又不失卻其原初獵捕本能，這需要超凡技藝的標本師才能做到。

cards.originalText: {2}: Stuffed Bear becomes a 4/4 green Bear artifact creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Deserted Beach
cards.text:
Deserted Beach enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.
cards.flavor: Drownyard floods and unnatural frost made the once peaceful boardwalk deceptively treacherous.

rulings.text: If this land enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of other lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.name: Verlassener Strand
foreignNames.text:
Der Verlassene Strand kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: Fluten im Unterwassergrab und unnatürlicher Frost haben den einst friedlichen Holzsteg tückisch morsch werden lassen.

foreignNames.name: Playa desierta
foreignNames.text:
La Playa desierta entra al campo de batalla girada a menos que controles otras dos o más tierras.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: Las inundaciones y heladas contranaturales del cementerio marino transformaron en un peligro traicionero a la tranquila pasarela de antaño.

foreignNames.name: Plage désertée
foreignNames.text:
La Plage désertée arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux autres terrains.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: Les inondations du cimetière marin et le gel surnaturel avaient fait de la promenade jadis si paisible un endroit traître et dangereux.

foreignNames.name: Spiaggia Deserta
foreignNames.text:
La Spiaggia Deserta entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli altre due o più terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli allagamenti della Relittopoli e il gelo innaturale avevano reso il pontile, un tempo pacifico, sorprendentemente pericoloso.

foreignNames.name: さびれた浜
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない２つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、さびれた浜はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{W}か{U}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 溺墓の洪水や不自然な霜によって、一時は平和的だった遊歩道が今は予想外で危険な場所に成り果てた。

foreignNames.name: 버려진 해변
foreignNames.text:
버려진 해변은 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {U}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 수장된 묘지에서 발생하는 홍수와 자연스럽지 못한 서리가 한때는 평화로웠던 판잣길을 눈에 보이는 것과는 달리 위험하게 만들었다.

foreignNames.name: Praia Deserta
foreignNames.text:
Praia Deserta entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle dois ou mais outros terrenos.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: As inundações e o congelamento antinatural na Costa Náufraga tornaram traiçoeiros caminhos outrora pacíficos.

foreignNames.name: Пустынный Пляж
foreignNames.text:
Пустынный Пляж выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем менее двух других земель.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {U}.
foreignNames.flavor: Затопленные кладбища и неестественные морозы сделали этот некогда безмятежный пляжный променад обманчиво вероломным.

foreignNames.name: 荒废沙滩
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更多其他地，否则荒废沙滩须横置进战场。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。
foreignNames.flavor: 沉船地的洪流和诡异冰霜，让这原本平稳的木板路径也变得颇为凶险。

foreignNames.name: 荒廢沙灘
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控兩個或更多其他地，否則荒廢沙灘須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{W}或{U}。
foreignNames.flavor: 沉船地的洪流和詭異冰霜，讓這原本平穩的木板路徑也變得頗為凶險。

cards.originalText:
Deserted Beach enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {W} or {U}.

cards.name: Evolving Wilds
cards.text: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
cards.flavor:
"Stensia blazes with new heat. Nephalia's tides are chaotic. And everywhere, this unnatural frost. The land is sending a warning."
—Katilda, Dawnhart Prime

foreignNames.name: Sich entfaltende Wildnis
foreignNames.text: {T}, opfere die Sich entfaltende Wildnis: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringe sie getappt ins Spiel und mische danach.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Stenzen lodert vor neuer Hitze. Die Gezeiten von Nefalen sind chaotisch. Und überall dieser unnatürliche Frost. Das Land sendet eine Warnung aus."
—Katilda, Morgenlicht-Oberste

foreignNames.name: Terrenos expansivos
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrificar los Terrenos expansivos: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, ponla en el campo de batalla girada y luego baraja.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Stensia se quema con un calor nuevo, las olas de Nephalia son caóticas y hay heladas extrañas por doquier. La tierra nos está alertando".
—Katilda, Gran Cierva del Alba

foreignNames.name: Étendues sauvages en évolution
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifiez les Étendues sauvages en évolution : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, mettez-la sur le champ de bataille engagée, puis mélangez.
foreignNames.flavor:
« La Stensie brûle sous l'effet de cette nouvelle chaleur. Les flots de la Néphalie sont chaotiques. Et partout, ce gel surnaturel. La terre envoit un avertissement. »
—Katilda, Première de Cerf-orient

foreignNames.name: Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione
foreignNames.text: {T}, Sacrifica le Terre Selvagge in Evoluzione: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta terra base, mettila sul campo di battaglia TAPpata, poi rimescola.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Stensia arde di un nuovo calore. Le maree di Nephalia sono caotiche. E ovunque regna questo gelo innaturale. Le terre cercano di mandarci un avvertimento."
—Katilda, Prima Albacorno

foreignNames.name: 進化する未開地
foreignNames.text: {T}, 進化する未開地を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、タップ状態で戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.flavor:
「ステンシアの猛火は激しさを増している。ネファリアの高波は混沌さを増している。そして至る所に、不自然な霜が降りている。大地が我々に警告してるのよ。」
――ドーンハルトの主導者、カティルダ

foreignNames.name: 진화하는 야생지
foreignNames.text: {T}, 진화하는 야생지를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드를 찾아, 탭된 채로 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"스텐시아가 새로운 열기를 발하며 불타오르고 있어. 네팔리아아의 파도는 무질서하고. 그리고, 이 부자연스러운 서리가 사방에 깔렸지. 대지가 경고를 보내고 있는 거야."
—새벽수사슴 지도자, 카틸다

foreignNames.name: Terras em Desenvolvimento
foreignNames.text: {T}, sacrifique Terras em Desenvolvimento: Procure um card de terreno básico em seu grimório, coloque-o no campo de batalha virado e depois embaralhe.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Stensia arde no calor. As marés de Nefália estão caóticas. E essa geada antinatural por toda parte. A terra está mandando um aviso."
— Katilda, Líder Cervo da Aurora

foreignNames.name: Перерождающиеся Дебри
foreignNames.text: {T}, пожертвуйте Перерождающиеся Дебри: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту базовой земли, положите ее на поле битвы повернутой, затем перетасуйте библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Стенсия пылает новым жаром. В Нефалии — хаотичные приливы. И везде этот неестественный мороз. Земля посылает нам предупреждение».
— Катильда, Первейшая Донхарта

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，牺牲成形野地：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「史顿襄新焰熊熊。涅非利亚乱浪滔滔。诡异冰霜肆虐四境。大地在发出警告。」
～曙鹿集巫首凯蒂妲

foreignNames.name: 成形野地
foreignNames.text: {T}，犧牲成形野地：從你牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor:
「史頓襄新焰熊熊。涅非利亞亂浪滔滔。詭異冰霜肆虐四境。大地在發出警告。」
～曙鹿集巫首凱蒂妲

cards.originalText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

cards.name: Field of Ruin
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

rulings.text: If the target land is an illegal target by the time Field of Ruin’s ability tries to resolve, the ability doesn’t resolve. No players search for a basic land card or shuffles. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), each player does search and shuffle.

foreignNames.name: Schauplatz der Verheerung
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}.
{2}, {T}, opfere den Schauplatz der Verheerung: Zerstöre ein Nichtstandardland deiner Wahl, das ein Gegner kontrolliert. Jeder Spieler durchsucht seine Bibliothek nach einer Standardland-Karte, bringt sie ins Spiel und mischt danach.

foreignNames.name: Campo de ruina
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrificar el Campo de ruina: Destruye la tierra no básica objetivo que controla un oponente. Cada jugador busca en su biblioteca una carta de tierra básica, la pone en el campo de batalla y luego baraja.

foreignNames.name: Champ de ruine
foreignNames.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrifiez le Champ de ruine : Détruisez un terrain non-base ciblé qu'un adversaire contrôle. Chaque joueur cherche dans sa bibliothèque une carte de terrain de base, la met sur le champ de bataille, puis mélange.

foreignNames.name: Campo della Rovina
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifica il Campo della Rovina: Distruggi una terra non base bersaglio controllata da un avversario. Ogni giocatore passa in rassegna il proprio grimorio per una carta terra base, la mette sul campo di battaglia, poi rimescola.

foreignNames.name: 廃墟の地
foreignNames.text:
{T}：{C}を加える。
{2}, {T}, 廃墟の地を生け贄に捧げる：対戦相手がコントロールしていて基本でない土地１つを対象とする。それを破壊する。各プレイヤーはそれぞれ、自分のライブラリーから基本土地・カード１枚を探し、戦場に出す。その後、ライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 파괴의 현장
foreignNames.text:
{T}: {C}를 추가한다.
{2}, {T}, 파괴의 현장을 희생한다: 상대가 조종하는 기본 대지가 아닌 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지를 파괴한다. 각 플레이어는 자신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드 한 장을 찾아, 전장에 놓은 후, 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Campo da Ruína
foreignNames.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}.
{2}, {T}, sacrifique Campo da Ruína: Destrua o terreno alvo não básico que um oponente controla. Cada jogador procura no próprio grimório um card de terreno básico, coloca-o no campo de batalha e depois embaralha.

foreignNames.name: Гибельное Поле
foreignNames.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}.
{2}, {T}, пожертвуйте Гибельное Поле: уничтожьте целевую небазовую землю под контролем оппонента. Каждый игрок ищет в своей библиотеке карту базовой земли, кладет ее на поле битвы, затем тасует библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 战场遗迹
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{2}，{T}，牺牲战场遗迹：消灭目标由对手操控的非基本地。每位牌手各从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 戰場遺跡
foreignNames.text:
{T}：加{C}。
{2}，{T}，犧牲戰場遺跡：消滅目標由對手操控的非基本地。每位玩家各從其牌庫中搜尋一張基本地牌，將之放進戰場，然後洗牌。

cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

cards.name: Haunted Ridge
cards.text:
Haunted Ridge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
cards.flavor: Swirling eddies of ash hide crumbling cliffs, treacherous drops, and the slavering maws of unknown evils.

rulings.text: If this land enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of other lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.name: Spukender Bergkamm
foreignNames.text:
Der Spukende Bergkamm kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {B} oder {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: Wirbel aus Asche verbergen bröckelnde Klippen, tückische Verwerfungen und die sabbernden Mäuler unbekannter Übel.

foreignNames.name: Risco embrujado
foreignNames.text:
El Risco embrujado entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles otras dos o más tierras.
{T}: Agrega {B} o {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: Los torbellinos de ceniza ocultan acantilados desmoronados, descensos traicioneros y las fauces hambrientas de males desconocidos.

foreignNames.name: Contreforts hantés
foreignNames.text:
Les Contreforts hantés arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagés à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux autres terrains.
{T} : Ajoutez {B} ou {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: Des tourbillons de cendres dissimulent les falaises s'effritant, les dénivelés traîtres et les gueules salivantes d'abominations inconnues.

foreignNames.name: Crinale Infestato
foreignNames.text:
Il Crinale Infestato entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli altre due o più terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {B} o {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: Mulinelli di cenere nascondono rupi in rovina, pericolosi strapiombi e le fauci sbavanti di mali ignoti.

foreignNames.name: 憑依された峰
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない２つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、憑依された峰はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{B}か{R}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 灰の竜巻によって、崩れる崖や危険な谷底や未知の悪のよだれが垂れた大口が隠れているのだ。

foreignNames.name: 귀신들린 산등성이
foreignNames.text:
귀신들린 산등성이는 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {B} 또는 {R}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 소용돌이치는 화산재가 무너져내리는 절벽과 위험한 폭포, 그리고 알려지지 않은 사악함을 질질 흘리는 아가리를 숨겨 준다.

foreignNames.name: Cordilheira Assombrada
foreignNames.text:
Cordilheira Assombrada entra no campo de batalha virada, a menos que você controle dois ou mais outros terrenos.
{T}: Adicione {B} ou {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: Redemoinhos de cinzas ocultam penhascos desmoronantes, quedas traiçoeiras e as gorjas ignóbeis de males desconhecidos.

foreignNames.name: Перевал Призраков
foreignNames.text:
Перевал Призраков выходит на поле битвы повернутым, если под вашим контролем менее двух других земель.
{T}: добавьте {B} или {R}.
foreignNames.flavor: За пепельными вихрями скрываются осыпающиеся скалы, коварные пропасти и ненасытное чрево неизвестного зла.

foreignNames.name: 闹鬼山脊
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更多其他地，否则闹鬼山脊须横置进战场。
{T}：加{B}或{R}。
foreignNames.flavor: 漩涡灰雾之下，藏着的是崩毁山崖、险峻峭壁和恶物血口。

foreignNames.name: 鬧鬼山脊
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控兩個或更多其他地，否則鬧鬼山脊須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{B}或{R}。
foreignNames.flavor: 漩渦灰霧之下，藏著的是崩毀山崖、險峻峭壁和惡物血口。

cards.originalText:
Haunted Ridge enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

cards.name: Hostile Hostel // Creeping Inn
cards.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a soul counter on Hostile Hostel. Then if there are three or more soul counters on it, remove those counters, transform it, then untap it. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.originalText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a soul counter on Hostile Hostel. Then if there are three or more soul counters on it, remove those counters, transform it, then untap it. Activate only as a sorcery.

cards.name: Hostile Hostel // Creeping Inn
cards.text:
Whenever Creeping Inn attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creature cards exiled with Creeping Inn.
{4}: Creeping Inn phases out.
cards.originalText:
Whenever Creeping Inn attacks, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, each opponent loses X life and you gain X life, where X is the number of creature cards exiled with Creeping Inn.
{4}: Creeping Inn phases out.

cards.name: Overgrown Farmland
cards.text:
Overgrown Farmland enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
cards.flavor: A few weed-choked gourd patches are all that remain of the proud, thriving farms that once blanketed the province.

rulings.text: If this land enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of other lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.name: Überwachsenes Ackerland
foreignNames.text:
Das Überwachsene Ackerland kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {G} oder {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Ein paar von Unkraut überwucherte Kalebassen-Felder sind alles, was von den stolzen, florierenden Gehöften bleibt, mit denen die Provinz einst bedeckt war.

foreignNames.name: Cultivos descuidados
foreignNames.text:
Los Cultivos descuidados entran al campo de batalla girados a menos que controles otras dos o más tierras.
{T}: Agrega {G} o {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: De las prósperas granjas que cubrían la provincia, ya solo quedan unos cuantos montones de calabazas asfixiadas por la hierba.

foreignNames.name: Terre agricole envahie
foreignNames.text:
La Terre agricole envahie arrive sur le champ de bataille engagée à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux autres terrains.
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Des fermes prospères florissant fièrement dans toute la province, il ne reste que quelques plants de citrouilles envahis par les mauvaises herbes.

foreignNames.name: Coltivazioni Infestate da Erbacce
foreignNames.text:
Le Coltivazioni Infestate da Erbacce entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate a meno che tu non controlli altre due o più terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Poche zucche soffocate dalle erbacce sono ciò che rimane delle fattorie fiere e rigogliose che un tempo ricoprivano la provincia.

foreignNames.name: 草茂る農地
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない２つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、草茂る農地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{G}か{W}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 以前は栄えた農場で覆われた地方だったが、今は雑草に浸食された瓜畑だけが残っている。

foreignNames.name: 잡초가 무성한 농지
foreignNames.text:
잡초가 무성한 농지는 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {G} 또는 {W}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 한때는 이 지방을 뒤덮었던 자랑스럽고 번창했던 농장들에서, 이제는 잡초가 무성한 호박밭 몇 개만이 남았을 뿐이다.

foreignNames.name: Campos Baldios
foreignNames.text:
Campos Baldios entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle dois ou mais outros terrenos.
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Uns poucos amontoados de abóbora cheios de erva daninha são o que sobrou das prósperas fazendas que outrora cobriam a província.

foreignNames.name: Заросшие Угодья
foreignNames.text:
Заросшие Угодья выходят на поле битвы повернутыми, если под вашим контролем менее двух других земель.
{T}: добавьте {G} или {W}.
foreignNames.flavor: Несколько поросших сорняками тыквенных грядок — вот и все, что осталось от некогда процветавших фермерских угодий, раскинувшихся на всю провинцию.

foreignNames.name: 蔓生农地
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更多其他地，否则蔓生农地须横置进战场。
{T}：加{G}或{W}。
foreignNames.flavor: 覆盖行省的傲人沃田如今已然荒芜，只剩丛生杂草点缀其间。

foreignNames.name: 蔓生農地
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控兩個或更多其他地，否則蔓生農地須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{G}或{W}。
foreignNames.flavor: 覆蓋行省的傲人沃田如今已然荒蕪，只剩叢生雜草點綴其間。

cards.originalText:
Overgrown Farmland enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

cards.name: Rockfall Vale
cards.text:
Rockfall Vale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.
cards.flavor: Cries of panic echo along Kessig's narrow ravines as howlpacks herd their prey.

rulings.text: If this land enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of other lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.name: Felssturz-Tal
foreignNames.text:
Das Felssturz-Tal kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {R} oder {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Panische Schreie hallen durch die engen Schluchten von Kessig, während Heulerrudel ihre Beute zusammentreiben.

foreignNames.name: Valle de los desprendimientos
foreignNames.text:
El Valle de los desprendimientos entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles otras dos o más tierras.
{T}: Agrega {R} o {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Los gritos de pánico retumban por los estrechos desfiladeros de Kessig cuando las jauría aullantes arrean a sus presas.

foreignNames.name: Val de Rocheruine
foreignNames.text:
Le Val de Rocheruine arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux autres terrains.
{T} : Ajoutez {R} ou {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Des cris de panique retentissaient le long des ravins étroits de Kessig tandis que les meutes rabattaient leur proie.

foreignNames.name: Valle delle Frane
foreignNames.text:
La Valle delle Frane entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpata a meno che tu non controlli altre due o più terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {R} o {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Grida di panico riecheggiano tra le strette gole del Kessig, mentre gli ulubranchi inseguono le loro prede.

foreignNames.name: 落石の谷間
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない２つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、落石の谷間はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{R}か{G}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 吠え群れが獲物を追う中、阿鼻叫喚がケッシグの狭い峡谷で鳴り響く。

foreignNames.name: 낙석 계곡
foreignNames.text:
낙석 계곡은 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {R} 또는 {G}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 포효떼가 멋잇감을 몰아 가면, 당황한 자들의 외침 소리가 메아리가 되어 케시그의 좁은 계곡을 따라 울려 퍼진다.

foreignNames.name: Vale das Pedras Cadentes
foreignNames.text:
Vale das Pedras Cadentes entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle dois ou mais outros terrenos.
{T}: Adicione {R} ou {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Gritos de pânico ecoam pelos barrancos estreitos de Kessig quando as alcateias uivantes perseguem suas presas.

foreignNames.name: Долина Камнепадов
foreignNames.text:
Долина Камнепадов выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем менее двух других земель.
{T}: добавьте {R} или {G}.
foreignNames.flavor: Панические крики эхом разносятся по узким ущельям Кессига, где воющие стаи загоняют свою добычу.

foreignNames.name: 落石山谷
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更多其他地，否则落石山谷须横置进战场。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。
foreignNames.flavor: 嚎群在凯锡革狭窄山谷间追捕猎物，惊慌哀号回荡此处经久不绝。

foreignNames.name: 落石山谷
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控兩個或更多其他地，否則落石山谷須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{R}或{G}。
foreignNames.flavor: 嚎群在凱錫革狹窄山谷間追捕獵物，驚慌哀號迴盪此處經久不絕。

cards.originalText:
Rockfall Vale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

cards.name: Shipwreck Marsh
cards.text:
Shipwreck Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
cards.flavor: The bones of doomed ships jut out from the muck while the bones of their sailors molder below.

rulings.text: If this land enters the battlefield at the same time as any number of other lands, those other lands are not counted when determining if this land enters the battlefield tapped or untapped.

foreignNames.name: Schiffswrack-Morast
foreignNames.text:
Der Schiffswrack-Morast kommt getappt ins Spiel, es sei denn, du kontrollierst zwei oder mehr andere Länder.
{T}: Erzeuge {U} oder {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Masten verlorener Schiffe ragen aus dem Schlamm, während die Knochen ihrer Seeleute darunter verrotten.

foreignNames.name: Cenagal de naufragios
foreignNames.text:
El Cenagal de naufragios entra al campo de batalla girado a menos que controles otras dos o más tierras.
{T}: Agrega {U} o {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: Los despojos de las embarcaciones condenadas sobresalen del fango, mientras que los de los marineros se pudren más abajo.

foreignNames.name: Marécage aux épaves
foreignNames.text:
Le Marécage aux épaves arrive sur le champ de bataille engagé à moins que vous ne contrôliez au moins deux autres terrains.
{T} : Ajoutez {U} ou {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: Les carcasses de vaisseaux condamnés saillissent de la boue tandis que les ossements de leurs équipages pourrissent en dessous.

foreignNames.name: Acquitrino dei Relitti
foreignNames.text:
L'Acquitrino dei Relitti entra nel campo di battaglia TAPpato a meno che tu non controlli altre due o più terre.
{T}: Aggiungi {U} o {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: Gli scheletri delle navi sventurate affiorano dalla fanghiglia, mentre gli scheletri dei marinai marciscono al di sotto.

foreignNames.name: 難破船の湿地
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこれでない２つ以上の土地をコントロールしていないかぎり、難破船の湿地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
{T}：{U}か{B}を加える。
foreignNames.flavor: 悲運な船の竜骨が泥土から突出し、その下には船員の苔むした骸骨だけが残っている。

foreignNames.name: 난파선 습지대
foreignNames.text:
난파선 습지대는 당신이 다른 대지를 두 개 이상 조종하지 않는 한 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
{T}: {U} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.
foreignNames.flavor: 파멸을 맞이한 배의 뼈대가 진흙 밖으로 튀어나와 있고, 배에 타고 있던 선원들의 뼈는 그 아래에서 썩어 간다.

foreignNames.name: Charco do Naufrágio
foreignNames.text:
Charco do Naufrágio entra no campo de batalha virado, a menos que você controle dois ou mais outros terrenos.
{T}: Adicione {U} ou {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: As ossadas dos navios arruinados se projetam da lama, enquanto as dos marinheiros se decompõem sob ela.

foreignNames.name: Трясина Кораблекрушений
foreignNames.text:
Трясина Кораблекрушений выходит на поле битвы повернутой, если под вашим контролем менее двух других земель.
{T}: добавьте {U} или {B}.
foreignNames.flavor: Кости погибших кораблей торчат из ила, а кости их матросов плесневеют внизу.

foreignNames.name: 碎船沼地
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控两个或更多其他地，否则碎船沼地须横置进战场。
{T}：加{U}或{B}。
foreignNames.flavor: 遭难船只船身突出淤泥，船员尸身则在底下腐烂。

foreignNames.name: 碎船沼地
foreignNames.text:
除非你操控兩個或更多其他地，否則碎船沼地須橫置進戰場。
{T}：加{U}或{B}。
foreignNames.flavor: 遭難船隻船身突出淤泥，船員屍身則在底下腐爛。

cards.originalText:
Shipwreck Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more other lands.
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

cards.name: Wrenn and Seven
cards.text:
[+1]: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
[0]: Put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
[−3]: Create a green Treefolk creature token with reach and "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control."
[−8]: Return all permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

foreignNames.name: Wrenn und Sieben
foreignNames.text:
+1: Decke die obersten vier Karten deiner Bibliothek auf. Nimm alle Länderkarten, die auf diese Weise aufgedeckt wurden, auf deine Hand und lege den Rest auf deinen Friedhof.
0: Bringe eine beliebige Anzahl an Länderkarten aus deiner Hand getappt ins Spiel.
−3: Erzeuge einen grünen Baumhirte-Kreaturenspielstein mit Reichweite und „Stärke und Widerstandskraft dieser Kreatur sind gleich der Anzahl an Ländern, die du kontrollierst."
−8: Bringe alle bleibenden Karten aus deinem Friedhof auf deine Hand zurück. Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Du hast keine maximale Handkartenzahl."

foreignNames.name: Wrenn y Siete
foreignNames.text:
+1: Muestra las cuatro primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon todas las cartas de tierra mostradas de esta manera en tu mano y el resto en tu cementerio.
0: Pon en el campo de batalla giradas cualquier cantidad de cartas de tierra de tu mano.
−3: Crea una ficha de criatura Pueblo-arbóreo verde con la habilidad de alcance y "Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia de esta criatura son iguales a la cantidad de tierras que controlas".
−8: Regresa todas las cartas de permanente de tu cementerio a tu mano. Obtienes un emblema con "Tu mano no tiene tamaño máximo".

foreignNames.name: Wrenn et Sept
foreignNames.text:
+1: Révélez les quatre cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez toutes les cartes de terrain révélées de cette manière dans votre main et le reste dans votre cimetière.
0: Mettez sur le champ de bataille, engagées, n'importe quel nombre de cartes de terrain de votre main.
-3: Créez un jeton de créature verte Sylvin avec la portée et « La force et l'endurance de cette créature sont chacune égales au nombre de terrains que vous contrôlez. »
-8: Renvoyez toutes les cartes de permanent depuis votre cimetière dans votre main. Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Il n'y a pas de limite au nombre de cartes dans votre main ».

foreignNames.name: Wrenn e Sette
foreignNames.text:
+1: Rivela le prime quattro carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungi alla tua mano tutte le carte terra rivelate in questo modo e metti le altre nel tuo cimitero.
0: Metti sul campo di battaglia TAPpate un qualsiasi numero di carte terra dalla tua mano.
−3: Crea una pedina creatura Silvantropo verde con raggiungere e "La forza e la costituzione di questa creatura sono pari al numero di terre che controlli".
−8: Riprendi in mano tutte le carte permanente dal tuo cimitero. Ottieni un emblema con "Non hai un limite massimo di carte nella tua mano".

foreignNames.name: レンと七番
foreignNames.text:
+1：あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカードを４枚公開する。これにより公開されたすべての土地・カードをあなたの手札に、残りをあなたの墓地に置く。
0：あなたの手札にある望む枚数の土地・カードをタップ状態で戦場に出す。
-3：到達と「このクリーチャーのパワーとタフネスはそれぞれ、あなたがコントロールしている土地の数に等しい。」を持つ緑のツリーフォーク・クリーチャー・トークン１体を生成する。
-8：あなたの墓地にあるすべてのパーマネント・カードをあなたの手札に戻す。あなたは「あなたの手札の上限はなくなる。」を持つ紋章を得る。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — レン

foreignNames.name: 렌과 7호체
foreignNames.text:
+1: 당신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 네 장을 공개한다. 그중에서 대지 카드는 모두 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 무덤에 넣는다.
0: 당신의 손에 있는 대지 카드들을 원하는 만큼 탭된 채로 전장에 놓는다.
−3: 대공 및 "이 생물의 공격력 및 방어력은 당신이 조종하는 대지의 수와 같다."를 가진 녹색 인목 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
−8: 당신의 무덤에 있는 모든 지속물 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다. 당신은 "당신의 손은 크기 제한이 없다."를 가진 휘장을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Wrenn e Sete
foreignNames.text:
+1: Revele os quatro cards do topo de seu grimório. Coloque todos os cards de terreno revelados dessa maneira na sua mão e o restante no seu cemitério.
0: Coloque qualquer número de cards de terreno de sua mão no campo de batalha virados.
−3: Crie uma ficha de criatura Ent verde com alcance e "O poder e a resistência desta criatura são ambos iguais ao número de terrenos que você controla".
−8: Devolva todos os cards de permanente de seu cemitério para sua mão. Você recebe um emblema com "Não há limite para o número máximo de cards em sua mão".

foreignNames.name: Ренн и Седьмой
foreignNames.text:
+1: покажите четыре верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите все показанные таким образом карты земель в вашу руку, а остальные — на ваше кладбище.
0: положите любое количество карт земель из вашей руки на поле битвы повернутыми.
−3: создайте одну фишку существа зеленый Лесовик с Захватом и способностью «Сила и выносливость этого существа равны количеству земель под вашим контролем».
−8: верните все карты перманентов из вашего кладбища в вашу руку. Вы получаете эмблему со способностью «Ваш максимальный размер руки неограничен».

foreignNames.name: 芮恩与七树妖
foreignNames.text:
+1：展示你牌库顶的四张牌。将以此法展示的所有地牌置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。
0：将任意数量的地牌从你手上横置放进战场。
−3：派出一个绿色树妖衍生生物，且具有延势与「此生物的力量和防御力各等同于由你操控的地数量。」
−8：将所有永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「你的手牌数量没有上限。」

foreignNames.name: 芮恩與七樹妖
foreignNames.text:
+1：展示你牌庫頂的四張牌。將以此法展示的所有地牌置於你手上，其餘則置入你的墳墓場。
0：將任意數量的地牌從你手上橫置放進戰場。
−3：派出一個綠色樹妖衍生生物，且具有延勢與「此生物的力量和防禦力各等同於由你操控的地數量。」
−8：將所有永久物牌從你的墳墓場移回你手上。你獲得具有以下異能的徽記～「你的手牌數量沒有上限。」

cards.originalText:
+1: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
0: Put any number of land cards from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
−3: Create a green Treefolk creature token with reach and "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control."
−8: Return all permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size."

cards.name: Arlinn, the Pack's Hope // Arlinn, the Moon's Fury
cards.text:
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)
[+1]: Until your next turn, you may cast creature spells as though they had flash, and each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
[−3]: Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.
cards.originalText:
Daybound
+1: Until your next turn, you may cast creature spells as though they had flash, and each creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
−3: Create two 2/2 green Wolf creature tokens.

cards.name: Arlinn, the Pack's Hope // Arlinn, the Moon's Fury
cards.text:
Nightbound (If a player casts at least two spells during their own turn, it becomes day next turn.)
[+2]: Add {R}{G}.
[0]: Until end of turn, Arlinn, the Moon's Fury becomes a 5/5 Werewolf creature with trample, indestructible, and haste.
cards.originalText:
Nightbound
+2: Add {R}{G}.
0: Until end of turn, Arlinn, the Moon's Fury becomes a 5/5 Werewolf creature with trample, indestructible, and haste.

cards.name: Teferi, Who Slows the Sunset
cards.text:
[+1]: Choose up to one target artifact, up to one target creature, and up to one target land. Untap the chosen permanents you control. Tap the chosen permanents you don't control. You gain 2 life.
[−2]: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
[−7]: You get an emblem with "Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step" and "You draw a card during each opponent's draw step."

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Verlangsamer der Dämmerung
foreignNames.text:
+1: Bestimme bis zu ein Artefakt deiner Wahl, bis zu eine Kreatur deiner Wahl und bis zu ein Land deiner Wahl. Enttappe die bestimmten bleibenden Karten, die du kontrollierst. Tappe die bestimmten bleibenden Karten, die du nicht kontrollierst. Du erhältst 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
−2: Schaue dir die obersten drei Karten deiner Bibliothek an. Nimm eine davon auf deine Hand und lege den Rest in beliebiger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
−7: Du erhältst ein Emblem mit „Während des Enttappsegments jedes Gegners enttappst du alle bleibenden Karten, die du kontrollierst" und „Während des Ziehsegments jedes Gegners ziehst du eine Karte."

foreignNames.name: Teferi, el que retrasa el ocaso
foreignNames.text:
+1: Elige hasta un artefacto objetivo, hasta una criatura objetivo y hasta una tierra objetivo. Endereza los permanentes elegidos que controlas. Gira los permanentes elegidos que no controlas. Ganas 2 vidas.
−2: Mira las tres primeras cartas de tu biblioteca. Pon una de ellas en tu mano y el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en cualquier orden.
−7: Obtienes un emblema con "Durante el paso de enderezar de cada oponente, endereza todos los permanentes que controlas" y "Durante el paso de robar de cada oponente, robas una carta".

foreignNames.name: Téfeiri, celui qui ralentit le crépuscule
foreignNames.text:
+1: Choisissez jusqu'à un artefact ciblé, jusqu'à une créature ciblée et jusqu'à un terrain ciblé. Dégagez les permanents choisis que vous contrôlez. Engagez les permanents choisis que vous ne contrôlez pas. Vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
-2: Regardez les trois cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Mettez l'une d'elles dans votre main et le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque, dans l'ordre de votre choix.
-7: Vous gagnez un emblème avec « Dégagez tous les permanents que vous contrôlez pendant l'étape de dégagement de chaque adversaire » et « Vous piochez une carte pendant l'étape de pioche de chaque adversaire. »

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Che Rallenta il Tramonto
foreignNames.text:
+1: Scegli fino a un artefatto bersaglio, fino a una creatura bersaglio e fino a una terra bersaglio. STAPpa i permanenti scelti che controlli. TAPpa i permanenti scelti che non controlli. Guadagni 2 punti vita.
−2: Guarda le prime tre carte del tuo grimorio. Aggiungine una alla tua mano e metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in qualsiasi ordine.
−7: Ottieni un emblema con "STAPpa tutti i permanenti che controlli durante lo STAP di ogni avversario" e "Pesca una carta durante l'acquisizione di ogni avversario".

foreignNames.name: 日没を遅らせる者、テフェリー
foreignNames.text:
+1：アーティファクト最大１つとクリーチャー最大１体と土地最大１つを対象とする。あなたがコントロールしていて対象にしたパーマネントをアンタップする。あなたがコントロールしておらず対象にしたパーマネントをタップする。あなたは２点のライフを得る。
-2：あなたのライブラリーの一番上にあるカード３枚を見る。そのうち１枚をあなたの手札に、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に望む順番で置く。
−7：あなたは「各対戦相手のアンタップ・ステップに、あなたがコントロールしているすべてのパーマネントをアンタップする。」と「各対戦相手のドロー・ステップに、あなたはカード１枚を引く。」を持つ紋章を得る。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のプレインズウォーカー — テフェリー

foreignNames.name: 일몰을 늦추는 자, 테페리
foreignNames.text:
+1: 마법물체를 최대 한 개까지, 생물을 최대 한 개까지, 그리고 대지를 최대 한 개까지 목표로 정한다. 선택된 지속물들 중 당신이 조종하는 지속물들을 언탭한다. 선택된 지속물들 중 당신이 조종하지 않는 지속물들을 탭한다. 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
−2: 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 세 장을 본다. 그중 한 장을 당신의 손으로 가져가고 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 원하는 순서로 놓는다.
−7: 당신은 "각 상대의 언탭단에 당신이 조종하는 모든 지속물을 언탭한다." 및 "당신은 각 상대의 뽑기단에 카드 한 장을 뽑는다."를 가진 휘장을 얻는다.

foreignNames.name: Teferi, Atrasador do Poente
foreignNames.text:
+1: Escolha até um artefato alvo, até uma criatura alvo e até um terreno alvo. Desvire as permanentes escolhidas que você controla. Vire as permanentes escolhidas que você não controla. Você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
−2: Olhe os três cards do topo do seu grimório. Coloque um deles na sua mão e os restantes no fundo do seu grimório em qualquer ordem.
−7: Você recebe um emblema com "Desvire todas as permanentes que você controla durante a etapa de desvirar de cada oponente" e "Você compra um card durante a etapa de compra de cada oponente".

foreignNames.name: Тефери, Замедляющий Закат
foreignNames.text:
+1: выберите не более одного целевого артефакта, не более одного целевого существа и не более одной целевой земли. Разверните выбранные перманенты под вашим контролем. Поверните выбранные перманенты не под вашим контролем. Вы получаете 2 жизни.
—2: посмотрите три верхние карты вашей библиотеки. Положите одну из них в вашу руку, а остальные — в низ вашей библиотеки в любом порядке.
−7: Вы получаете эмблему со со способностями «Разверните все перманенты под вашим контролем во время шага разворота каждого оппонента» и «Вы берете карту во время шага взятия карты каждого оппонента».

foreignNames.name: 延日泰菲力
foreignNames.text:
+1：选择至多一个目标神器，至多一个目标生物和至多一个目标地。重置所选永久物中由你操控者。横置所选永久物中不由你操控者。你获得2点生命。
−2：检视你牌库顶的三张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。
−7：你获得具有以下异能的徽记～「于每位对手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的永久物」与「于每位对手的抓牌步骤中，你抓一张牌。」

foreignNames.name: 延日泰菲力
foreignNames.text:
+1：選擇至多一個目標神器，至多一個目標生物和至多一個目標地。重置所選永久物中由你操控者。橫置所選永久物中不由你操控者。你獲得2點生命。
−2：檢視你牌庫頂的三張牌。將其中一張置於你手上，其餘的牌則以任意順序置於你的牌庫底。
−7：你獲得具有以下異能的徽記～「於每位對手的重置步驟中，重置所有由你操控的永久物」與「於每位對手的抽牌步驟中，你抽一張牌。」

cards.originalText:
+1: Choose up to one target artifact, up to one target creature, and up to one target land. Untap the chosen permanents you control. Tap the chosen permanents you don't control. You gain 2 life.
−2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
−7: You get an emblem with "Untap all permanents you control during each opponent's untap step" and "You draw a card during each opponent's draw step."

cards.name: Brutal Cathar // Moonrage Brute
cards.text:
When this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Brutal Cathar, exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield.
Daybound (If a player casts no spells during their own turn, it becomes night next turn.)

rulings.text: Day and night are designations that the game itself can have. The game starts as neither. Once the game becomes day (or less commonly, night), the game will be exactly one of them—day or night—going back and forth for the rest of the game.
Before a player untaps their permanents during the untap step, the game checks to see if the day/night designation should change.
If it is day, and the active player of the previous turn cast no spells during their turn, it becomes night.
If it is night, and the active player of the previous turn cast two or more spells during their turn, it becomes day.

For more information about Day and Night and the Daybound and Nightbound abilities, please see the Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Mechanics atricle (https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/innistrad-midnight-hunt-mechanics-2021-09-02).

Double-faced permanents with daybound transform to their nightbound faces as it becomes night. Similarly, double-faced permanents with nightbound transform to their daybound faces as it becomes day. This happens immediately and is not a state-based action. It happens any time it becomes day or night, not just during the untap step.

If you cast a spell with daybound during night, that spell will be front face up (that is, daybound face up) on the stack. However, it will enter the battlefield with its back face up (that is, with its nightbound face up). It won’t enter with its daybound face up and then transform.
If it is night, permanents with daybound that enter the battlefield without being cast will enter with their nightbound faces up.

Permanents with daybound and nightbound can’t transform via any means other than their daybound and nightbound abilities. Notably, older cards such as Moonmist that instruct a player to transform permanents don’t affect permanents with daybound or nightbound.

If it’s neither day nor night, and a creature with daybound and a creature with nightbound somehow appear on the battlefield at the same time, it becomes day. The creature with nightbound will transform.

If it is day, and the active player of the previous turn cast no spells during their turn, it becomes night.
If it is night, and the active player of the previous turn cast two or more spells during their turn, it becomes day.

For more information about Day and Night and the Daybound and Nightbound abilities, please see the Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Mechanics atricle (https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/innistrad-midnight-hunt-mechanics-2021-09-02).

Double-faced permanents with daybound transform to their nightbound faces as it becomes night. Similarly, double-faced permanents with nightbound transform to their daybound faces as it becomes day. This happens immediately and is not a state-based action. It happens any time it becomes day or night, not just during the untap step.

If you cast a spell with daybound during night, that spell will be front face up (that is, daybound face up) on the stack. However, it will enter the battlefield with its back face up (that is, with its nightbound face up). It won’t enter with its daybound face up and then transform.
If it is night, permanents with daybound that enter the battlefield without being cast will enter with their nightbound faces up.

Permanents with daybound and nightbound can’t transform via any means other than their daybound and nightbound abilities. Notably, older cards such as Moonmist that instruct a player to transform permanents don’t affect permanents with daybound or nightbound.

If it’s neither day nor night, and a creature with daybound and a creature with nightbound somehow appear on the battlefield at the same time, it becomes day. The creature with nightbound will transform.

cards.name: Candlegrove Witch
cards.text: Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, Candlegrove Witch gains flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: A creature has different power from another if their powers are different numbers. For example, a 1/1 creature and a 2/1 creature have different powers.

For three creatures to have different powers from one another, each of their powers needs to be different. A 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and another 2/1 creature aren’t three creatures with different powers, even though both 2/1 creatures have different power than the 1/1 creature.

Many coven abilities, such as that of Dawnhart Wardens above, are triggered abilities with intervening if clauses. You must control three or more creatures with different powers at the time the ability triggers and at the time the ability tries to resolve. They do not, however, need to be the same set of creatures in both cases.

rulings.text: Day and night are designations that the game itself can have. The game starts as neither. Once the game becomes day (or less commonly, night), the game will be exactly one of them—day or night—going back and forth for the rest of the game.
Before a player untaps their permanents during the untap step, the game checks to see if the day/night designation should change.
If it is day, and the active player of the previous turn cast no spells during their turn, it becomes night.
If it is night, and the active player of the previous turn cast two or more spells during their turn, it becomes day.

For more information about Day and Night and the Daybound and Nightbound abilities, please see the Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Mechanics atricle (https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/innistrad-midnight-hunt-mechanics-2021-09-02).

Double-faced permanents with daybound transform to their nightbound faces as it becomes night. Similarly, double-faced permanents with nightbound transform to their daybound faces as it becomes day. This happens immediately and is not a state-based action. It happens any time it becomes day or night, not just during the untap step.

If you cast a spell with daybound during night, that spell will be front face up (that is, daybound face up) on the stack. However, it will enter the battlefield with its back face up (that is, with its nightbound face up). It won’t enter with its daybound face up and then transform.
If it is night, permanents with daybound that enter the battlefield without being cast will enter with their nightbound faces up.

Permanents with daybound and nightbound can’t transform via any means other than their daybound and nightbound abilities. Notably, older cards such as Moonmist that instruct a player to transform permanents don’t affect permanents with daybound or nightbound.

If it’s neither day nor night, and a creature with daybound and a creature with nightbound somehow appear on the battlefield at the same time, it becomes day. The creature with nightbound will transform.

cards.name: Dawnhart Mentor
cards.text:
When Dawnhart Mentor enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
Coven — {5}{G}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate only if you control three or more creatures with different powers.

rulings.text: A creature has different power from another if their powers are different numbers. For example, a 1/1 creature and a 2/1 creature have different powers.

For three creatures to have different powers from one another, each of their powers needs to be different. A 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and another 2/1 creature aren’t three creatures with different powers, even though both 2/1 creatures have different power than the 1/1 creature.

Many coven abilities, such as that of Dawnhart Wardens above, are triggered abilities with intervening if clauses. You must control three or more creatures with different powers at the time the ability triggers and at the time the ability tries to resolve. They do not, however, need to be the same set of creatures in both cases.

rulings.text: Day and night are designations that the game itself can have. The game starts as neither. Once the game becomes day (or less commonly, night), the game will be exactly one of them—day or night—going back and forth for the rest of the game.
Before a player untaps their permanents during the untap step, the game checks to see if the day/night designation should change.
If it is day, and the active player of the previous turn cast no spells during their turn, it becomes night.
If it is night, and the active player of the previous turn cast two or more spells during their turn, it becomes day.

For more information about Day and Night and the Daybound and Nightbound abilities, please see the Innistrad: Midnight Hunt Mechanics atricle (https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/innistrad-midnight-hunt-mechanics-2021-09-02).

Double-faced permanents with daybound transform to their nightbound faces as it becomes night. Similarly, double-faced permanents with nightbound transform to their daybound faces as it becomes day. This happens immediately and is not a state-based action. It happens any time it becomes day or night, not just during the untap step.

If you cast a spell with daybound during night, that spell will be front face up (that is, daybound face up) on the stack. However, it will enter the battlefield with its back face up (that is, with its nightbound face up). It won’t enter with its daybound face up and then transform.
If it is night, permanents with daybound that enter the battlefield without being cast will enter with their nightbound faces up.

Permanents with daybound and nightbound can’t transform via any means other than their daybound and nightbound abilities. Notably, older cards such as Moonmist that instruct a player to transform permanents don’t affect permanents with daybound or nightbound.

If it’s neither day nor night, and a creature with daybound and a creature with nightbound somehow appear on the battlefield at the same time, it becomes day. The creature with nightbound will transform.

cards.name: Dawnhart Wardens
cards.text:
Vigilance
Coven — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: A creature has different power from another if their powers are different numbers. For example, a 1/1 creature and a 2/1 creature have different powers.

For three creatures to have different powers from one another, each of their powers needs to be different. A 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and another 2/1 creature aren’t three creatures with different powers, even though both 2/1 creatures have different power than the 1/1 creature.

Many coven abilities, such as that of Dawnhart Wardens above, are triggered abilities with intervening if clauses. You must control three or more creatures with different powers at the time the ability triggers and at the time the ability tries to resolve. They do not, however, need to be the same set of creatures in both cases.

cards.name: Lier, Disciple of the Drowned
cards.text:
Spells can't be countered.
Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has flashback. The flashback cost is equal to that card's mana cost.

rulings.text: “Flashback [cost]” means “You may cast this card from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than paying its mana cost” and “If the flashback cost was paid, exile this card instead of putting it anywhere else any time it would leave the stack.”

You must still follow any timing restrictions and permissions, including those based on the card’s type. For instance, you can cast a sorcery using flashback only when you could normally cast a sorcery.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a flashback cost) you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of the spell is determined only by its mana cost, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was.
A spell cast using flashback will always be exiled afterward, whether it resolves, is countered, or leaves the stack in some other way.
You can cast a spell using flashback even if it was somehow put into your graveyard without having been cast.
If a card with flashback is put into your graveyard during your turn, you can cast it if it’s legal to do so before any other player can take any actions.
If you cast an instant or sorcery with {X} in its mana cost this way, you still choose the value of X as part of casting the spell and pay that cost.

If you cast a spell with flashback, you can’t pay any alternative costs such as overload costs. You can pay additional costs such as kicker costs. If the spell has any mandatory additional costs, you must pay those to cast the spell with flashback.
If a card has multiple instances of flashback, you may choose any of its flashback costs to pay.
If a split card gains flashback, you pay only the cost of the half you’re casting.
If a card with no mana cost gains flashback, it has no flashback cost. It can’t be cast this way.

rulings.text: Decayed represents a static ability and a triggered ability. “Decayed” means “This creature can’t block” and “When this creature attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.”

cards.name: Dennick, Pious Apprentice // Dennick, Pious Apparition
cards.text:
Lifelink
Cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities.
Disturb {2}{W}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard transformed for its disturb cost.)

rulings.text: Disturb is found only on the front faces of some double-faced cards.
“Disturb [cost]” means “You may cast this card transformed from your graveyard by paying [cost] rather than its mana cost.”
When you cast a spell using a card’s disturb ability, the card is put onto the stack with its back face up. The resulting spell has all the characteristics of that face.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost (such as a disturb cost) you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The mana value of a spell cast using disturb is determined by the mana cost on the front face of the card, no matter what the total cost to cast the spell was. (This is a special rule that applies only to transforming double faced-cards, including ones with disturb.)
A spell cast this way enters the battlefield with its back face up.
If you copy a permanent spell cast this way (perhaps with a card like Double Major), the copy becomes a token that’s a copy of the card’s back face, even though it isn’t itself a double-faced card.

The back face of each card with disturb has an ability that instructs its controller to exile if it would be put into a graveyard from anywhere. This includes going to the graveyard from the stack, so if the spell is countered after you cast it using the disturb ability, it will be put into exile.

foreignNames.name: Viejo Dedos de Palo

Cuando lances este hechizo, muestra cartas de la parte superior de tu biblioteca hasta que muestres X cartas de criatura. Pon todas las cartas de criatura mostradas de esta manera en tu cementerio y luego pon el resto en el fondo de tu biblioteca en un orden aleatorio.
Tanto la fuerza como la resistencia del Viejo Dedos de Palo son iguales a la cantidad de cartas de criatura en tu cementerio.

foreignNames.name: Vieux brindodactyle
foreignNames.text:
Quand vous lancez ce sort, révélez les cartes du dessus de votre bibliothèque jusqu'à ce que vous révéliez X cartes de créature. Mettez toutes les cartes de créature révélées de cette manière dans votre cimetière, puis mettez le reste au-dessous de votre bibliothèque dans un ordre aléatoire.
La force et l'endurance du Vieux brindodactyle sont chacune égales au nombre de cartes de créature dans votre cimetière.

foreignNames.name: Vecchio Ditalunghe
foreignNames.text:
Quando lanci questa magia, rivela carte dalla cima del tuo grimorio finché non riveli X carte creatura. Metti nel tuo cimitero tutte le carte creatura rivelate in questo modo, poi metti le altre in fondo al tuo grimorio in ordine casuale.
La forza e la costituzione del Vecchio Ditalunghe sono pari al numero di carte creatura nel tuo cimitero.

foreignNames.name: 年経枝指
foreignNames.text:
あなたがこの呪文を唱えたとき、クリーチャー・カードＸ枚が公開されるまで、あなたのライブラリーの一番上から１枚ずつ公開していく。これにより公開されたすべてのクリーチャー・カードをあなたの墓地に置き、その後、残りをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に無作為の順番で置く。
年経た枝指のパワーとタフネスはそれぞれ、あなたの墓地にあるクリーチャー・カードの枚数に等しい。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — ホラー

foreignNames.name: 늙은 막대손가락
foreignNames.text:
당신이 이 주문을 발동할 때, 당신이 생물 카드를 X장 공개할 때까지 당신의 서고 맨 위 카드를 공개한다. 이런 식으로 공개된 모든 생물 카드를 당신의 무덤에 넣은 후, 나머지 카드들은 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 무작위 순서로 놓는다.
늙은 막대손가락의 공격력과 방어력은 각각 당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드의 수와 같다.

foreignNames.name: Velho Dedos-de-palito
foreignNames.text:
Quando conjurar esta mágica, revele cards do topo de seu grimório até revelar X cards de criatura. Coloque todos os cards de criatura revelados dessa forma em seu cemitério e os demais no fundo de seu grimório em ordem aleatória.
O poder e a resistência de Velho Dedos-de-palito são ambos iguais ao número de cards de criatura no seu cemitério.

foreignNames.name: Старик Клейкопалый
foreignNames.text:
Когда вы разыгрываете это заклинание, показывайте карты с верха вашей библиотеки до тех пор, пока вы не покажете X карт существ. Положите все показанные таким образом карты существ на ваше кладбище, затем положите остальные карты в низ вашей библиотеки в случайном порядке.
Сила и выносливость Старика Клейкопалого равны количеству карт существ на вашем кладбище.

foreignNames.name: 老枯指
foreignNames.text:
当你施放此咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出X张生物牌为止。将以此法展示的所有生物牌置入你的坟墓场，然后将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。
老枯指的力量和防御力各等同于你坟墓场中的生物牌数量。

foreignNames.name: 老枯指
foreignNames.text:
當你施放此咒語時，從你的牌庫頂開始展示牌，直到展示出X張生物牌為止。將以此法展示的所有生物牌置入你的墳墓場，然後將其餘的牌以隨機順序置於你的牌庫底。
老枯指的力量和防禦力各等同於你墳墓場中的生物牌數量。

cards.originalText:
When you cast this spell, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal X creature cards. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your graveyard, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Old Stickfingers's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

cards.name: Rem Karolus, Stalwart Slayer
cards.text:
Flying, haste
If a spell would deal damage to you or another permanent you control, prevent that damage.
If a spell would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

foreignNames.name: Rem Karolus, unverzagter Jäger
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend, Eile
Falls ein Zauberspruch dir oder einer anderen bleibenden Karte, die du kontrollierst, Schaden zufügen würde, verhindere den Schaden.
Falls ein Zauberspruch einem Gegner oder einer bleibenden Karte, die ein Gegner kontrolliert, Schaden zufügen würde, fügt er stattdessen entsprechend viele Schadenspunkte plus 1 zu.

foreignNames.name: Rem Karolus, exterminador leal
foreignNames.text:
Vuela, prisa.
Si un hechizo fuera a hacerte daño a ti o a otro permanente que controlas, prevén ese daño.
Si un hechizo fuera a hacer daño a un oponente o un permanente que controla un oponente, en vez de eso, hace esa misma cantidad de daño más 1.

foreignNames.name: Rem Karolus, tueur vaillant
foreignNames.text:
Vol, célérité
Si un sort devait infliger des blessures à vous ou à un autre permanent que vous contrôlez, prévenez ces blessures.
Si un sort devait infliger des blessures à un adversaire ou à un permanent qu'un adversaire contrôle, il inflige autant de blessures plus 1 à la place.

foreignNames.name: Rem Karolus, Sterminatore Intrepido
foreignNames.text:
Volare, rapidità
Se una magia sta per infliggere danno a te o a un altro permanente che controlli, previeni quel danno.
Se una magia sta per infliggere danno a un avversario o a un permanente controllato da un avversario, infligge invece altrettanti danni più 1.

foreignNames.name: 確固たる討伐者、レム・カロラス
foreignNames.text:
飛行、速攻
呪文が、あなたやあなたがコントロールしていてこれでないパーマネントにダメージを与えるなら、そのダメージを軽減する。
呪文が、対戦相手や対戦相手がコントロールしているパーマネントにダメージを与えるなら、代わりに、それはその点数に１を足した点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 人間・騎士

foreignNames.name: 충직한 시해자, 렘 카롤러스
foreignNames.text:
비행, 신속
주문이 당신 또는 당신이 조종하는 다른 지속물에게 피해를 입히려 한다면, 그 피해를 방지한다.
주문이 상대 또는 상대가 조종하는 지속물에 피해를 입히려고 하면, 그 주문은 대신 그 피해에 1을 더한 만큼 피해를 입힌다.

foreignNames.name: Rem Karolus, Matador Resoluto
foreignNames.text:
Voar, ímpeto
Se uma mágica causaria dano a você ou a outra permanente que você controla, previna aquele dano.
Se uma mágica causaria dano a um oponente ou a uma permanente que um oponente controla, em vez disso, ela causa aquela quantidade de dano mais 1.

foreignNames.name: Рем Каролус, Храбрый Истребитель
foreignNames.text:
Полет, Ускорение
Если заклинание должно нанести повреждения вам или другому перманенту под вашим контролем, предотвратите те повреждения.
Если заклинание должно нанести повреждения оппоненту или перманенту под контролем оппонента, вместо этого оно наносит то количество повреждений плюс 1.

foreignNames.name: 不渝克星连卡洛
foreignNames.text:
飞行，敏捷
如果某咒语将对你或另一个由你操控的永久物造成伤害，则防止该伤害。

foreignNames.name: 不渝剋星連卡洛

如果某咒語將向任一對手或任一由對手操控的永久物造成傷害，則改為它造成原數量加1點傷害。

cards.name: Sigarda, Champion of Light
cards.text:
Flying, trample
Humans you control get +1/+1.
Coven — Whenever Sigarda attacks, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a Human creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

rulings.text: A creature has different power from another if their powers are different numbers. For example, a 1/1 creature and a 2/1 creature have different powers.

For three creatures to have different powers from one another, each of their powers needs to be different. A 1/1 creature, a 2/1 creature, and another 2/1 creature aren’t three creatures with different powers, even though both 2/1 creatures have different power than the 1/1 creature.

Many coven abilities, such as that of Dawnhart Wardens above, are triggered abilities with intervening if clauses. You must control three or more creatures with different powers at the time the ability triggers and at the time the ability tries to resolve. They do not, however, need to be the same set of creatures in both cases.

foreignNames.text:
Fliegend, verursacht Trampelschaden
Menschen, die du kontrollierst, erhalten +1/+1.

Du kannst davon eine Mensch-Kreaturenkarte offen vorzeigen und auf deine Hand nehmen. Lege den Rest in zufälliger Reihenfolge unter deine Bibliothek.
